definition: unmarried/single
bill/list/form/single/only/sole/odd number/CL:個|个[ge4]
surname Shan
body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158
bachelor/unmarried man
(Internet slang) person who is neither married nor in a relationship (used self-deprecatingly)
(Internet slang) person who is neither married nor in a relationship (used self-deprecatingly)
fig. unmarried person/single person (especially one who is comfortable financially)

sentences.english: When you are in love, what in your eyes are all happy singles.
sentences.chinese: 當你戀愛的時候，你看到的都是快樂的單身族。

sentences.english: Today's companies should think of high-earning singles as a key market.
sentences.chinese: 當今的企業應該把高收入的單身族當成重要的市場。

sentences.english: Thirty-six percent of singles would consider dating someone in the workplace.
sentences.chinese: 36%的單身者會考慮與同事約會。

sentences.english: He's just been setting up a bachelor party, he says.
sentences.chinese: 他說他剛纔在佈置一個單身漢派對的會場。

sentences.english: Lesbian- and gay-parented households as well as single adoptive parents were usually left out.
sentences.chinese: 而同性戀家庭和單身養父母常被遺漏。

sentences.english: When you are single, your love affairs are hardly news.
sentences.chinese: 當你單身時，你的風流韻事是重要新聞。

sentences.english: I guess he's sort of a miser like most bachelors .
sentences.chinese: 我想他一定是個吝嗇鬼，象大部分單身漢一樣。

sentences.english: The sitcom single woman is never alone for long.
sentences.chinese: 情景喜劇中的單身女人從來不會獨身很久的。

sentences.english: The bad behaviour of his bachelor brother continued unabated.
sentences.chinese: 那個仍是單身的兄弟，將繼續他的不良操行。

sentences.english: Whether or not you're currently attached, you could be encountering some interesting romantic opportunities before the day is through.
sentences.chinese: 甭管你單身還是有了另一半，你今天還能遭遇桃花。

sentences.english: Being alone is much better than with a prick who studies excrement.
sentences.chinese: 單身總比和研究排泄物的笨蛋在一起好吧。

sentences.english: Seema is 41, and a single mother.
sentences.chinese: Seema今年41歲，是以爲單身母親。

sentences.english: Single fish will find their red fish or bae fish this year.
sentences.chinese: 單身雙魚座今年會找到他們的紅魚或者愛魚。

sentences.english: Don't fight not gentleness don't eosinophilic alcohol and tobacco, single good woman alone.
sentences.chinese: 不傾城不溫柔不嗜菸酒，單身隻身好女人。

sentences.english: I am a single mother and try to keep an eye on him .
sentences.chinese: 我是一個單身媽媽，並且努力管住我的孩子。

sentences.english: Or just lots of other wild singles.
sentences.chinese: 或者只是更多其他狂野的單身貴族？
